programmes.show_description: Jordaine visits Nemesis Models for a nerve-racking audition that could change her life. Hal wants to swap street fighting for modelling in the hope of keeping out of prison
Young model Juan fears his career could be over after he is attacked in the street. Jordaine gets a life-changing opportunity to model for one of the world's top brands.
David and Moira decide to sample some wine while visiting Herb Ertlinger's vineyard; Johnny attempts to have "the talk" with Patrick.
Comedy series. Roland and Jocelyn want to spend a night in the new motel's presidential suite, but must compete with Johnny and Moira for the room.

Over three rounds, contestants Maureen, Matt, Marisa and Stefan vie to find the single 'unbeatable" answer and streak ahead of the rest to make the final where they can win a cash prize. Genera
Eamonn Holmes and Ruth Langsford host the fun daily quiz. Three engaged couples have the chance to win their wedding gift list - and a dream holiday.
Three players are pit against a mesmerising machine. There are mystery prizes and a jaw-dropping jackpot up for grabs for any player.
An exploration of the negative reputation of scavenger vultures through footage, storytelling and an environmental message.
All the latest from the world of UEFA Champions League. Featuring highlights and interviews.
Returning for an impressive 28th season, this primetime vocal competition continues to seek out exciting new singers based solely on their amazing voices.
Cooking competition hosted by Sheree Murphy which sees professional chefs select an amateur partner to work with in the final. Nigel Haworth chooses his home cook.
Brian McFadden presents the dining challenge show. Four diners struggle over comedian Helen Lederer's cryptic clues as she throws a dinner party at her home.
Which of today's nine - Sue, Joe, Elias, Gerry, Michael, Trevor, Alice, Tarryn or John - will win the prize pot? Omid Djalili presents.
Fashion-themed dating challenge. In London, three singletons go up against each other in a series of shopping challenges, hoping to win the affections of footballer Roger.
The Beast, The Governess, The Sinnerman, The Vixen and The Dark Destroyer - the greatest quiz team that ever was, but can anyone Beat the Chasers for big money?
A mum trying to improve her life takes a job as a cleaner and stumbles upon access to illegal stock market information that could be the answer to her problem.
A large mass of passengers arrives for Easter celebrations, which leads to complications; hundreds of staff members work on an expansive re-signalling project.
Davina McCall meets a lady who wants to be able to smile for the first time in 30 years, and a music teacher who would love to become a published author.
The stylists help a personal hygiene salesman who only wears black, a man who wears children's clothes and a PE teacher who wants to wear glamorous things.
Investors Emma Grede and Ashley Graham invite a group of women entrepreneurs to pitch their side hustles; with mentorship and an investment on the line, the entrepreneurs battle over which foun
Love Island USA has returned for a seventh explosive series. It sees twelve singles arriving at a luxury villa in Fiji to spend their summer looking for love.
Narrated by Rory Cowan, this observational series sees Ireland's opinionated TV viewers commenting freely on the best and worst TV shows of the past week.
Johnny becomes too invasive in Alexis' romantic life; Moira's interview with People magazine leaves the townspeople offended.
One of Moira's former producers suggests a reboot of her old soap Sunrise Bay. Alexis watches the show to study its politics and gives Moira some sage advice.
The Roses struggle to participate in an Escape Room at David and Patrick's Bachelor Party when their personal dilemmas become a distraction.
The family waits anxiously as Stevie, Johnny and Roland head to a pitch meeting.

Helena, Andy, Carly and Tony compete in the quiz, hosted by Jason Manford.
A French bulldog with walking problems is brought in to receive specialised spinal surgery; a wild seal requires treatment to save its eye.
Three players are pit against a mesmerising machine. There are mystery prizes and a jaw-dropping jackpot up for grabs for any player.
Nadia Sawalha from "Loose Women" and her dog face the agility course.
Host Ben Shephard features a group of challengers who must correctly answer questions for the opportunity to operate a large coin-drop machine.
Returning for an impressive 28th season, this primetime vocal competition continues to seek out exciting new singers based solely on their amazing voices.
Ross' ex and her lesbian lover tie the knot, providing Monica with a job catering the wedding; the spirit of a massage client possesses Phoebe.
Ross discovers Marcel's career in commercials while visiting him in California; Joey's first fan turns out to be a delusional stalker.
Rachel and Monica compete for the affections of Jean-Claude Van Damme on a movie set; Chandler meets a former schoolmate who seems hot for him.
After getting his big break, Joey pays Chandler back; Monica and Rachel's prom video reveals Ross' feelings for Rachel, as well as Monica's former girth.
Ross and Rachel consummate their new relationship in the display area of the museum; Monica begins dating a handsome older doctor.
Stephen Mulhern hosts the on-the-street game show. In this second series opener, Stephen hits the streets of Nottingham to find someone to play for a thousand pounds
More contestants are hoping to win big money taking on The Beast, The Governess, The Sinnerman, The Vixen and The Dark Destroyer, but can they Beat the Chasers?
Cooking competition in which professional chefs select an amateur partner to work with in the final. Michelin-starred chef Galton Blackiston makes his decision.
A pair of childhood sweethearts seeks the assistance of a surrogate to get the child they are hoping for; a policewoman searches for love in her life.
Prestige Pawnbrokers specialise in pawning luxurious and costly objects. They open their doors to reveal the hidden world of high-end pawnbroking.
Sam and Billie are taking part in a rebirthing workshop in a bid to reduce Billie's stress, but they aren't prepared for how emotional the session will be as th
Wilford invites Audrey to join him on Big Alice, but he has a plot in the works; Josie attempts to pass information to the Snowpiercer.
Graham Norton is getting up close and personal with various celebrities on his famous sofa.
Keith from Cornwall hopes to get a golf ball-sized lump removed from the back of his neck; Hayley recalls memories of childhood skin problems for Dr Dev.
